mapper.sql: create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, signback_id, order_id, shipments_id, signback_num, shipments_num, order_num, signback_time, clientele_id, clientele_num, clientele_name, personnel_id, personnel_name, status, leader, email, phone, mobilephone, address, audit_by, audit_time, remark
mapper.select: select sign.signback_id, sign.order_id, sign.shipments_id, sign.signback_num, sign.shipments_num, sign.order_num, sign.signback_time, sign.clientele_id, sign.clientele_num, sign.clientele_name, sign.personnel_id, sign.personnel_name, sign.status, sign.leader, sign.email, sign.phone, sign.mobilephone, sign.address, sign.audit_by, sign.audit_time, sign.remark,sign_num,rejection_num,process_mode,sign.signback_status ,u.nickname as personnel_name from sys_signback sign left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sign.personnel_id /*left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id*/ where sign.signback_id=#{id}

select sign.signback_id, sign.order_id, sign.shipments_id, sign.signback_num, sign.shipments_num, sign.order_num, sign.order_time, sign.signback_time, sign_num,rejection_num,process_mode from sys_signback sign
sign.clientele_id=#{sign.clienteleId} and sign.signback_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.signbackNum}),'%')
or sign.order_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.orderNum}),'%')
or sign.shipments_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.shipmentsNum}),'%')
order by sign.create_time desc

select sign.clientele_id, sign.clientele_num, sign.clientele_name, sign.order_id, sign.order_num, sign.order_time, sign.shipments_id, sign.shipments_num, sign.signback_id, sign.signback_num, sign.signback_time,so.taxrate,so.taxamount from sys_signback sign left join sys_order so on so.order_id=sign.order_id
sign.signback_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.signbackNum}),'%')
or sign.order_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.orderNum}),'%')
or sign.shipments_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.shipmentsNum}),'%')
or sign.clientele_num like concat(concat('%',#{sign.clienteleNum}),'%')
or sign.clientele_name like concat(concat('%',#{sign.clienteleName}),'%')
order by sign.create_time desc
